name: ReportFilter

constructors.name: ReportFilter
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the Reports.ReportFilter class. You can then set values by using the “set” methods.

constructors.name: ReportFilter
constructors.signature: public ReportFilter(String column, String operator, String value)
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the Reports.ReportFilter class by using the specified parameters.

methods.name: getColumn
methods.description: Returns the unique API name for the field that’s being filtered.

methods.name: getOperator
methods.description: Returns the unique API name for the condition that is used to filter a field, such as “greater than” or “not equal to.” Filter conditions depend on the data type of the field.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the value by which a field can be filtered. For example, the field Age can be filtered by a numeric value.

methods.name: setColumn
methods.description: Sets the unique API name for the field that’s being filtered.

methods.name: setOperator
methods.description: Sets the unique API name for the condition that is used to filter a field, such as “greater than” or “not equal to.” Filter conditions depend on the data type of the field.

methods.name: setValue
methods.description: Sets the value by which a field can be filtered. For example, the field Age can be filtered by a numeric value.

description: Contains information about a report filter, including column, operator, and value.
